html:
2026-0139
2026-02-19GACSpecial Economic Measures ActRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations in order to (1) add twenty-one (21) individuals, fifty-three (53) entities and one hundred (100) vessels to Schedule 1 of the Regulations and prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; (2) make non-substantive corrections to Schedule 1.1 for precision and accuracy; and move one entity currently listed under Schedule 3 which covers new debt financing prohibitions to the schedule 1 of the Regulations; and (4) amend Schedule 10.01 to lower the oil price cap (OPC) per barrel on Russian crude oil from US$47.60 to US$44.10.Registration: SOR/2026-0030 Publication Date: 2026-03-11
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations in order to (1) add twenty-one (21) individuals, fifty-three (53) entities and one hundred (100) vessels to Schedule 1 of the Regulations and prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; (2) make non-substantive corrections to Schedule 1.1 for precision and accuracy; and move one entity currently listed under Schedule 3 which covers new debt financing prohibitions to the schedule 1 of the Regulations; and (4) amend Schedule 10.01 to lower the oil price cap (OPC) per barrel on Russian crude oil from US$47.60 to US$44.10.
